Package com.idc.data

Class DataTable

java.lang.Object
com.idc.model.DataTable
public class DataTable
extends java.lang.Object
The DataTable class is used for working with loaded com.idc.data (CSVRow objects).
Version:
1.0
Author:
Daniel Zboril
